title: 服务器崩了  求神帮助啊
txt_content:
求大神救救我吧  呜呜
实在不知道怎么回事额
我技术渣得很  求救啊亲
下面有crash—report的附件  万分感谢 啊



crash-2013-07-13_22.32.01-server.txt
(17.21 KB, 下载次数: 24)



2013-7-13 23:14 上传
点击文件名下载附件












--- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I let you down. Sorry :(


Time: 7/13/13 10:32 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop


java.lang.NullPointerException
        at net.minecraft.inventory.Container.transferTo(Container.java:43)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_5_R3.event.CraftEventFactory.handleInventoryCloseEvent(CraftEventFactory.java:664)
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ServerConfigurationManager.disconnect(ServerConfigurationManager.java:373)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetServerHandler.func_72565_c(NetServerHandler.java:280)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkListenThread.func_71747_b(NetworkListenThread.java:65)
        at org.spigotmc.netty.NettyServerConnection.func_71747_b(NettyServerConnection.java:68)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:926)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:324)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:794)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:678)
        at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(SourceFile:573)

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 看来你服务器的内存不稳定，可以试试把你的地图删了【先做一个备份，删了以后再放回去】，还是不行的话，去问问你的租家【如果是租的服的话】

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content: 看起来像是地图里的某处出错了， 有没有禁止玩家放置漏斗？

wolski 发表于 2013-7-14 00:59
